alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Broome, southwestern Madison, Cortland, northeastern Tioga, southeastern Onondaga and northwestern Chenango Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fabius to East Freetown to Richford. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Virgil, Preble, Richford, Truxton, Solon, Cincinnatus, Otselic, McGraw and Willet. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 8 and 11, and between 13 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Tioga
